```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
```

```{r}
# Load the data
asthma_df <- read_dta("data/family asthma p1 data version2.dta")
```

```{r}
# Reshape the data
asthma_tidy_df <- asthma_df %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = matches("\\d+$"),           
    names_to = c(".value", "visit"),  
    names_pattern = "([a-z]+)(\\d+)"   
  ) %>%
  select(family, id, visit, everything())

```
